about_the_game: This product contains five digital wallpapers showcasing the original artworks of Pioneers of Pagonia. Includes the key artwork, our signature windmill, the co-op artwork, our iconic geologist and a scenic landscape picture of a Pagonian island. All wallpapers come in 8k resolution and are only available with the Supporter Edition.
detailed_description: This product contains five digital wallpapers showcasing the original artworks of Pioneers of Pagonia. Includes the key artwork, our signature windmill, the co-op artwork, our iconic geologist and a scenic landscape picture of a Pagonian island. All wallpapers come in 8k resolution and are only available with the Supporter Edition.
legal_notice: Copyright Envision Entertainment GmbH 2023 - all rights reserved!
name: Pioneers of Pagonia Wallpaper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows® 10 version 1909 or newer
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 1050 Mobile / AMD Radeon RX470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please note that Intel Integrated Graphics (UHD, Iris Xe) are not supported.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows® 10 version 1909 or newer
  • Processor: Hexa Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please note that Intel Integrated Graphics (UHD, Iris Xe) are not supported.

short_description: This wallpaper pack includes the original key artwork, the signature windmill, and a scenic landscape of the city builder game Pioneers of Pagonia.
supported_languages: English, German, French, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Italian, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Dutch, Thai, Czech, Turkish, Ukrainian, Slovak
